directions: Stir the watermelon, pineapple, and onion together with the cilantro, orange juice, and hot sauce in a bowl. Cover, and refrigerate at least 30 minutes before serving.
ingredients: 2 cups finely chopped seeded watermelon (do not puree)
1/4 teaspoon hot sauce, such as Tabasco, or to taste
title: Watermelon Salsa
